title: Fawlty Towers: Basil the Rat
brief_description: Manuel insists that his pet rodent is a Siberian hamster. Basil is convinced that the pet shop has conned the gullible Spaniard and sold him a rat - a fine thing to have running around the hotel when the public health inspector is also on the loose.
description: Manuel insists that his pet rodent is a Siberian hamster. Basil is convinced that the pet shop has conned the gullible Spaniard and sold him a rat - a fine thing to have running around the hotel when the public health inspector is also on the loose.
